18. $y=\cfrac{|x+2|}{2+x}(x^2+4x+3)=\begin{cases}x^2+4x+3,\ x>-2,\\ -x^2-4x-3,\ x<-2.\end{cases}$
$$% TIKZ_ID{task018-solution-fig1}
